title: Taken Aback
description:
Al Jackson, Lesley Jones and Rachel Anne Warren share stories about a bad magician, being suspended by ropes, and attempting a strange miracle for a dying brother.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Kyro, Al Jackson, Lesley Jones, Rachel Anne Warren, Jonathan Geer, Quilt, Jeff Barr, Kevin Allison, Thunder Jackson)
